__e: I could understand if you got angry, but motiveless malice is beyond me who says malice is easier to resist than anger?
- I'll confide in you if you're Ira.
I'm sorry Ira, but if we have to we will.
What Is the Wrath of God?
Don't you see that the wrath of God is upon you?
I understand a fury in your words, but not the words.
Don't you see that the wrath of God is upon you?
Ira, somehow it doesn't seem right. Father against his own son.
You alone he leaves to suffer the aroused anger of the people of France.
I don't believe in your God of wrath.
Sir, I now feel anger from our Captain.
Ira and I will do all we can to help you.
A man who does not fear your wrath and yet does not tremble in your presence... is not a man.
We must kill him to appease the Gods' wrath!
Now we are going to offer you as a sacrifice to the gods who have been betrayed.
Go before the wrath of the gods overtakes you!
The greater your lament is, the greater is my rage.
Anger's good sometimes in a fighting soldier.
